  • Class
    Description
    BlockHandler
    Used to control the spacing applied before/after certain blocks, which visitors are created elsewhere.
    MarkdownBuilder
     
    Markflow
    Entry point of Markdown API, it provides a context for parsing and rendering Markdown.
    Markflow.Builder
     
    MarkflowConfig
    Holds configuration for rendering Markdown.
    MarkflowConfig.Builder
     
    MarkflowPlugin
    Class represents an extension to Markflow to configure how parsing and rendering of Markdown is carried on.
    MarkflowPlugin.Registry
    This class holds registered plugins and used to set dependencies.
    MarkflowTheme
    Controlling the styled attributes for rendering Markdown.

    MarkflowVisitor
    Used for rendering and building Markdown.
    MarkflowVisitor.Builder
     
    NodeVisitor<N extends org.commonmark.node.Node>
    Visitor for certain node class, can be called from ANY thread.
    SpanFactory<N extends org.commonmark.node.Node>
    Span factory is invoked by MarkflowVisitor to create spans for a given node.
    TextSetter
    Interface to set text on a TextView.
